options.help:
Display your product or service pricing options in a clear, comparative format. Use this when:

  • Showcasing different service tiers
  • Highlighting feature differences between plans
  • Promoting special offers or featured plans
  • Presenting subscription options

Best practices:

  • Use clear, benefit-focused plan names
  • Highlight your recommended or most popular option
  • Keep feature lists scannable and easy to compare
  • Include clear call-to-action buttons for each plan
options.title: Pricing Block
